title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1235/1999 of 15 June 1999 definitively fixing the aid for unginned cotton from 1 September 1998 to 31 March 1999 for the 1998/99 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1235/1999
of 15 June 1999
definitively fixing the aid for unginned cotton from 1 September 1998 to 31 March 1999 for the 1998/99 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aid on unginned cotton corresponding to the world prices fixed in Commission Regulations (EC) No 1865/98(8), (EC) No 1954/98(9), (EC) No 2010/98(10), (EC) No 2048/98(11), (EC) No 2087/98(12), (EC) No 2146/98(13), (EC) No 2195/98(14), (EC) No 2243/98(15), (EC) No 2302/98(16), (EC) No 2312/98(17), (EC) No 2372/98(18), (EC) No 2478/98(19), (EC) No 2571/98(20), (EC) No 2707/98(21), (EC) No 2859/98(22), (EC) No 85/1999(23), (EC) No 238/1999(24), (EC) No 262/1999(25), (EC) No 306/1999(26), (EC) No 355/1999(27), (EC) No 371/1999(28), (EC) No 396/1999(29), (EC) No 426/1999(30), (EC) No 474/1999(31), and (EC) No 687/1999(32), shall be as set out in the Annex hereto, which amount shall be fixed definitively from the entry into force of each of the Regulations concerned.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
